trustfund:
TF038854-KYRGYZ REPUBLIC - FLOOD
            EMERGENCY PROJECT,TF034812-ECA REGION - IRRIGATION
            PROJECTS (KRYGYZ REP.,KAZAKSTAN,,TF034356-ECA REGION - UZBEKISTAN - AGR.
            INCENTIVES, KYRGYZ REP. - AGRIC.,TF022858-FLOOD EMERGENCY PROJECT -
            KYRGYZ REPUBLIC

abstracts.cdata!:
The Flood Emergency Project seeks to
            rehabilitate or reconstruct: a) damaged flood protection
            infrastructure along rivers; and b) irrigation
            infrastructure. The project consists of two components. 1)
            Rehabilitation/reconstruction of river protection and
            irrigation infrastructure will finance repair and
            rehabilitation of eroded river embankments in five rivers,
            together with rehabilitation and reconstruction of 23
            protective spurs. The component will also finance the
            rehabilitation and reconstruction of selected irrigation
            infrastructure inside and outside of river beds at 16
            different schemes. Within the river beds the repair works
            will include intake spurs, irrigation conveyance canals and
            their embankments, spurs to protect such embankments, and
            spillways and gated headworks. Outside the river beds the
            repair works will include drain overpass reconstruction,
            spillway reconstruction from debris dams and repair of
            concrete lining. 2) Project management and implementation
            support will establish a project implementation unit for the
            project's daily management. Consulting firms will be
            contracted for the preparation of feasibility studies. The
            component will also support two study tours to countries
            where different methods of flood protection are practiced.
